alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 10:44AM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...From this morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:35 AM CST Saturday the stage was 2.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:35 AM CST Saturday was 2.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 2.1 feet this afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.1 Sat 10 am CS 1.9 1.8 1.9 &&
